docs.snippet: LEAD: PARMIGIANO REGGIANO, an indispensable cheese in Italian cooking, is commonly known in English as Parmesan. But much is often lost in the translation.
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: PARMIGIANO REGGIANO, an indispensable cheese in Italian cooking, is commonly known in English as Parmesan. But much is often lost in the translation.

headline.main: De Gustibus; Saying 'Cheese' Sometimes Makes Italians Frown

docs.snippet: LEAD: The United States hit back today at critics of the unilateral action it has taken on trade issues, saying others did the same and should not pass judgment.

docs.snippet: LEAD: When the United States returns to World Cup soccer action in June after an absence of 40 years, it will play in the same group as Italy, which is the host team and one of the world's soccer powers.

docs.snippet: LEAD: An Argentine financier was sentenced Friday to seven years in prison for his role in one of the biggest bank frauds ever prosecuted in New York.

docs.snippet: LEAD: An Argentine man charged with laundering $250 million in cocaine proceeds through storefronts in Los Angeles and New York pleaded not guilty today in Federal court here, Judge William Keller ordered the man, Raul Silvio Vivas, held without bail...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: An Argentine man charged with laundering $250 million in cocaine proceeds through storefronts in Los Angeles and New York pleaded not guilty today in Federal court here, Judge William Keller ordered the man, Raul Silvio Vivas, held without bail on the argument by prosecutors that he is the mastermind of an international network.

headline.main: Argentine Charged in Money Scheme Is Sent to U.S.

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: LEAD: The Bush Administration announced today that countries that provide two-thirds of the steel imported into America had signed agreements to end Government subsidies like low-cost loans and export incentive payments that help their steelmakers.

docs.snippet: LEAD: An article on Nov. 5 about elections in Uruguay gave an incorrect party affiliation for the vice-presidential candidate of the Broad Front, a leftist coalition. The candidate, Danilo Astori, has since informed The Times that he is an...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: An article on Nov. 5 about elections in Uruguay gave an incorrect party affiliation for the vice-presidential candidate of the Broad Front, a leftist coalition. The candidate, Danilo Astori, has since informed The Times that he is an independent, not a Communist Party member.

docs.snippet: LEAD: The United States has won a 20-year fight with the European Community over European soybean subsidies, the United States trade representative, Carla A. Hills, said today. American farmers have complained that the subsidies cost them hundreds of...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The United States has won a 20-year fight with the European Community over European soybean subsidies, the United States trade representative, Carla A. Hills, said today. American farmers have complained that the subsidies cost them hundreds of millions of dollars a year in lost exports.

byline.original: By CLYDE H. FARNSWORTH, Special to The New York Times
